docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Feat
docs.text:
• mkdocs (#29)
  • add comment (#26)
  • cd pipeline (#9)
  • uv and ruff
  • github actions ci pipeline (#5)
  • codecov action
  • pytest coverage by default
  • flake8
  • genbadge
  • update readme
  • readme badges
  • linting

docs.title: Fix
docs.text:
• wrong dependencies in bump-version (#33)

  • add action permission (#23)
  • dispatch trigger (#21)
  • various cd fixes (#17)
  • pr permissions (#15)
  • gh pr create fill (#14)
  • gh token (#13)
  • upstream (#12)
  • dev-requirements.txt to reduce vulnerabilities (#6)
  • dev-requirements.txt to reduce vulnerabilities (#2)
  • pytest python path

docs.title: Refactor
docs.text:
• split format and lint scripts
  • combine requirements files
